title: A Fairy Tale
description: Lotte is not your average teenage girl. She has spent her entire life trying to hide one fact from the world â€“ that she isn't human. But what will happen after Lotte meets Andy, a boy who knows far too much about her and how much more than human she is? Lotte's eyes will be opened to a world far bigger than her imagination, and risk losing everything she has in return.
author: Caitie-Maree Clarke
